title: My Boyfriend is A Dragon - Novel Updates
tags: Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Modern Day   Police   Possessive Characters   Strong Love Interests   Tragic Past   World Hopping   Younger Love Interests
author: Chubby Strawberry Sauce   草莓胖次酱
description: A young boy named Bai Wu was saved and adopted by a thirty-something police sergeant named Xu Lan. It was love at first sight for Bai Wu, and once he started getting older, his heart yearned for a taste of the forbidden fruit - the romantic love of his adoptive father. The question is, will Xu Lan ever reciprocate? With deranged serial killers, parallel dimensions, time warps, dragons, and a bit of ancient black magic, Bai Wu and Xu Lan are caught in a series of crazy adventures while discovering what they truly mean to each other. This is a story of lust and madness!>
